name: with-context-mcp
description: Add project-specific context and documentation to AI conversations using markdown files, with seamless Obsidian vault integration for managing knowledge bases and project notes.

installation.summary: Install via npm and configure with your markdown notes directory or Obsidian vault path for context injection.

usage.markdown:
## Usage

Once configured, you can reference your markdown notes in AI conversations:

### Basic Usage
```
Use the context from architecture-decisions.md to help refactor this code
```

### Obsidian Integration
If you use Obsidian, the plugin automatically reads from your vault:
- Project documentation
- Architecture decision records (ADRs)
- Code style guides
- API specifications
- Team conventions

### Organizing Context
Create markdown files in your notes directory:
```
notes/
  project-overview.md
  api-guidelines.md
  deployment-process.md
  troubleshooting.md
```

The AI can then use these files as additional context for better, project-specific responses.
